# reloadData()

**Instance Method**

Reloads the content of the entire scrubber, and deselects the currently selected item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func reloadData()
```

## Reloading content

- **reloadItems(at:)**: Reloads the items at the specified indexes.

items.description: Reloads the items at the specified indexes.
items.name: reloadItems(at:)

title: reloadData()
